tool_description: Email Validation Service that checks if a specific e-mail address is valid. It verifies if the domain is proper and whether the e-mail is a temporary or disposable address. The API includes a database of 180,000 disposable email domains to ensure accurate validation.

api_list.name: Email Checker
api_list.description: Checks if the provided email address is valid or if it may be a disposable email.

required_parameters.name: email
required_parameters.description: The email address to be checked for validity.
